attributes.action: tell Pete aka Neil Grimes that he is fooling himself into thinking he can match the backgammon prowess of a certain Wayne Ledlie aka THE BACKGAMMON CHAMPION 4EVA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further more Pete aka Neil should admit to Wayne that he is a mere backgammon dunce in comparison to the KING aka Wayne, and that if only he paid attention he could learn a lot from him. He should also tell Wayne that he is brilliant in every other aspect. Pete is continuously playing catch up and to date he has never caught up, maybe he should learn from this fact. He should also stop playing with himself in work as it is both unhealthy and unproductive

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
